com.netflix.msl.crypto
Class MslSignatureEnvelope

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.msl.crypto.MslSignatureEnvelope

public class MslSignatureEnvelope
extends Object

MSL signature envelopes contain all of the information necessary for verifying data using a known key.

Method Detail

parse

public static MslSignatureEnvelope parse(byte[] envelope,
                                         MslSignatureEnvelope.Version version)
                                  throws MslCryptoException,
                                         MslEncodingException
Create a new signature envelope for the specified version from the provided envelope bytes.

Parameters:
envelope - the raw envelope bytes.
version - the envelope version.
Returns:
the envelope.
Throws:
MslCryptoException - if there is an error processing the signature envelope.
MslEncodingException - if there is an error parsing the JSON.
See Also:
